item.description:
Meet other local men and fathers to discuss fairness in family law and the equal treatment of men and fathers in family court, laws and society.
Our objective is to promote and preserve active, caring and responsible fatherhood.
Our mission statement
-To Secure Equal Parenting Rights and Responsibilities for men and women by:
-Raising awareness of the social problems and harm to children caused by fatherlessness.
-Reversing government laws and policies that promote fatherlessness.
-Restoring constitutional protections for fundamental rights in Family Law.
-Restricting state intrusions into the sanctity of the family
We are a chapter of state-wide "The Fatherhood Coalition" at www.fatherhoodcoalition.org.
item.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition
